snippet: The president endorses an approach that would encourage individual academic departments to set their own grading standards.
abstract: Princeton University president Christopher L Eisgruber endorses new approach to grading that will encourage academic departments to set their own grading standards; endorsement could mean an end to policy that limited number of students who received top marks for their courses.
lead_paragraph: The president endorses an approach that would encourage individual academic departments to set their own grading standards.

headline.main: Princeton Is Proposing to End Limit on Giving A’s
headline.print_headline: Princeton Is Proposing to End Limit on Giving A’s
